articles.author: Noa Dalzell
articles.title: The Indiana Fever just got devastating news — and now face a difficult decision - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Both Sydney Colson and Aari McDonald are out for the season with injury, the Fever announced on Friday.
articles.content: The Indiana Fever announced on Friday afternon that theyll be without two rotation players for the rest of the season: guards Sydney Colson (torn left ACL) and Aari McDonald (broken right foot). That… [+1992 chars]
